cleaned_text: In homeopathy we don't have multivitamins medicines but we surely have biochemic medicines which are in homeopathy tonic form, you just give your detail history I will give you medicines .or you can consult me through WhatsApp (eight eight seven nine seven nine two three eight seven )start with 1)alpha alpha tonic 5ml for 2times Next Steps for further medicines you consult me through online . Health Tips for vitamin B12 if you are vegetarian eat all milk products , drink milk ,cereals, pulses. If you are non vegetarian eat meat, chicken, fish and eggs. Talk to experienced doctor online and get your health questions answered in just 5 minutes. There are no such medicine in homeopathy. The Homoeopathic medicine correct body's internal mechanism and then body gets the required vitamin from.thr food source. Taking just vitamin supplement will help temporarily.
